channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-44198|2024-09-16T20:27:10.015Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: DLL hijacking could lead to local privilege escalation. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 28035

item.title: CVE-2022-24113|2024-09-16T19:57:01.189Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to excessive permissions assigned to child processes. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Windows) before build 28035, Acronis Agent (Windows) before build 27147, Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (Windows) before build 39612, Acronis True Image 2021 (Windows) before build 39287

item.title: CVE-2022-30992|2024-09-16T19:10:09.912Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%2015
item.description: Open redirect via user-controlled query parameter. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, Windows) before build 29240

item.title: CVE-2022-24115|2024-09-16T16:52:37.123Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20protect%20home%20office
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to unrestricted loading of unsigned libraries. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office (macOS) before build 39605, Acronis True Image 2021 (macOS) before build 39287

item.title: CVE-2021-34800|2024-09-16T19:30:26.012Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information could be logged. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Windows, Linux, macOS) before build 27147
